verbose_text: Another studies have shown that long-term aspirin desensitization involves IL-4 inhibition, downregulation of proinflammatory matrix metallopeptidase 9, an increase in the Th1 marker FMS related tyrosine kinase 3 ligand, and a decrease in the IL-10 and interferon-gamma expression of CD4 (+) T lymphocytes [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
